dc:title: On Pilgrimage - February 1980
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Diary jottings of people coming and going, music listened to, books read, and little delights. Describes herself as "on the shelf" and quotes a prayer of Ephraim the Syrian on sloth.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 602 1980-02-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
